sentences.en: All the stock prices jumped up in Tokyo last month.
sentences.cn: 上月东京各种股票价格都大幅度上涨.

sentences.en: Cities such as Tokyo are spreading out.
sentences.cn: 东京等城市正在不断扩展。

sentences.en: Fish was unobtainable in certain sections of Tokyo.
sentences.cn: 在东京的某些地方是买不到鱼的。

sentences.en: He said that he had never been to Tokyo.
sentences.cn: 他说他从来没去过东京.

sentences.en: He was born in Yamagata prefecture, north of Tokyo.
sentences.cn: 他出生在东京以北的山形县。

sentences.en: Her flight will be rerouted via Tokyo.
sentences.cn: 她乘坐的航班将改变航线途经东京。

sentences.en: In early trading in Tokyo, the dollar fell sharply against the yen.
sentences.cn: 在东京市场早市开盘时，美元对日元的比价急剧下跌。

sentences.en: In Tokyo share prices have plummeted for the sixth successive day.
sentences.cn: 东京股价已连续第6天猛跌。

sentences.en: On my way to New York, I stopped over in Tokyo for two days.
sentences.cn: 我在去纽约的途中在东京停了两天。

sentences.en: Share prices on the Tokyo Exchange declined moderately.
sentences.cn: 东京股票交易所的股价小幅下跌。

sentences.en: The book's strength lay in its depiction of present-day Tokyo.
sentences.cn: 该书的精彩之处在于其对现今东京的描写。

sentences.en: The US dollar closed higher in Tokyo today.
The US dollar continued its strong performance in Tokyo today.
sentences.cn: 美元今天在东京继续保持强劲的走势。

sentences.en: They are going from Shanghai to Los Angeles via Tokyo.
sentences.cn: 他们从上海经东京去洛杉矶。

sentences.en: Venerable dailies such as the Tokyo Times have shut down.
sentences.cn: 像《东京时报》之类的一些有名望的日报已经停刊了。
